data.text: I really don't know where to start. This was our 9th visit to KaiSol. The hotel is just so lovely and quite. The food is exceptionally some of the best in Egypt. I have mentioned before how the staff are the best. From beach boys Karim is always there and has been our friend from the begining, he is polite, helpful and friendly. Ibrahim on reception is a very special person to us. There really are too many to mention you all but all the staff make our holiday very special. Thank you all, see you in October ðŸ˜Š
data.title: Home from home

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guests,
Thank you very much for your feedback, we do appreciate your high appraisal of our hotel and the staff. 
We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay and already wait to see you again in your second home. 

With best regards,
Hotel Management
owner_response.author: KaiSol Romance Resort Adults Only

data.text: I returned to this wonderful hotel for the third time in April after an absence of three years to find it even better than my previous visits.The food was even better and the staff even friendlier than before, if that was possible. Special mention must go the delightful Mahmoud who kept my room so nicely. To Karim who looked after me so well at meal times and the very special Am,a lovely ,lovely man back from sick leave,and Taha who made sure I lacked for nothing on the wonderful beach. I must also mention the delightful manager Shoukry who was constantly checking that all was running smoothly.Also a mention for the lovely Guest Relations Svetlana, friendly and a great little mover when the music was playing,!! I plan to return to this paradise later in the year. Canâ€™t wait !!
data.title: The perfect beach holiday

user_location.name: Milford on Sea, Lymington, New Forest National Park Hampshire, Hampshire, England

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Michael M,

We are happy that you had a wonderful stay with us and we want to thank you for sharing your experience about our resort.
We hope we can welcome you soon again in our resort and make your stay as comfortable as this one.

Best regards,
The Hotel management.
owner_response.author: KaiSol Romance Resort Adults Only

data.text:
We have just arrived back from another fantastic week at KaiSol Romance. We received a really warm welcome while checking in and were given a beautiful sea view room with a stunning view. 
We ate at the a la carte restaurants and all were superb ( thank you George and Mohamed for looking after us in the Italian and Indian restaurant) The main buffet restaurant had a huge selection of food and it was all delicious. The staff in there work really hard and are so friendly. Thank you Mary and Roselyn for the Lattes every morning. 
In the Romance Bar, drinks were  served by Divine and Karim, they were great and we really enjoyed chatting  with them every evening. The waiters from the Landscape Bar worked tirelessly every night serving everyone their drinks, (thank you Tamer and Fayez for keeping our drinks flowing) 
The beach is stunning,  the sea was crystal clear  and there were always sunbeds available at any time of the day. Kareem and Mohamed,  the lifeguards, are brilliant, putting your towels down and moving your beds for you ( thanks Kareem, I can see through my sunglasses now). On Easter Sunday the hotel stood a giant wooden egg on the beach and Mr Shoukry, the hotel manager invited everyone to decorate it, a musician then played while guests were served an amazing buffet with cocktails. Itâ€™s the extra things like that which makes the KaiSol so special.  
This hotel is beautiful, the food is great and ALL staff are so attentive especially Ibrahim who is so caring and helpful ensuring all guests enjoy their holiday - which is why so many people return year after year.
data.title: Amazing Hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Amanda S,

Thank you for the great review! We are happy that your stay at the KaiSol Romance Resort left a great impression. It is wonderful to hear that you were left satisfied by our friendly staff.

Thank you again for sharing; we canâ€™t wait see you when your visit us again!

The hotel Management
owner_response.author: KaiSol Romance Resort Adults Only

data.text:
We liked this hotel due to the a la carte restaurants but 2 were being refurbished (although nothing is mentioned on their or any travel website?) leaving only 2 open and basically, they just couldnâ€™t cope. 

We were disappointed with the lack of care regarding food contamination. Nothing is labelled, I couldnâ€™t find much to eat as itâ€™s geared up to meat eaters. Daily there are at least 6-8 meat dishes but nothing vegetarian. Salads are not labelled, soup the same. Very frustrating. They couldnâ€™t even get our packed lunch correct when we went to Luxor. I asked for cheese, my husband chicken. We both got cheese and chicken wrapped up in the same cling film so I couldnâ€™t eat them due to yet more contamination. We were told all kitchen staff are trained regarding basic food hygiene but this wasnâ€™t apparent. I raised the same issues last year and was informed that there was going to be a new vegetarian and plant based menu at the patio bar but of course this hasnâ€™t happened. 

Vegetarian food should be separate as sometimes utensils by the vegetables had been used by guests for meat and put back covered in sauce, I used to use my own cutlery so I knew it was clean.

Towels were threadbare, sheets were old and bobbling, I wouldnâ€™t use them for my cat! Cracked sink in bathroom, nowhere to hang towels coming out of the shower. Drinks pretty bad. The hotel ran out of vodka, gin, juice for 24 hours, the replacements were un drinkable. We went next door for a decent drink in the end. 

Waiters were clueless, especially at the patio cafe. Youâ€™d order and theyâ€™d forget or bring the wrong drink. The pool we gave up and got our own drinks from the beach bar as the waiter by the pool only served people who tipped him. We were ignored first over an hour. Finally got a flat lager then just walked to the pool bar, didnâ€™t bother with the pool again. 

The lobby bar was our go to bar prior to dinner and after but again, you waited ages for a drink while people who came after us got served. We gave up ordering drinks so stood at the bar otherwise you didnâ€™t get served. 

Trying to get a drink or a coffee in the main buffet took far too long. The waitresses were running around but were seriously understaffed. Why not have a drinks section so you can make your own coffee? This would free up the staff to do their jobs more efficiently. Waiters were too busy clearing and setting up tables but missing side plates, napkins, water etc. 

The buffet is laid out strangely. The egg station is directly in the centre so there is a bottle neck trying to get to either side of the buffet. Getting porridge in a morning was a trial as the bowls were one side, the porridge in the middle next to the chips and meat? Why? Last year was better. The honey was the complete opposite end as was the cinnamon and not a blueberry or raspberry in sight. 

Pool tiles missing, in need of a lot of repair work. You only get decent service if you tip heavily or daily which is disgraceful. On day one we tipped the beach guy and we had front row, second day on the second row, by the end of the week we were by the bins. We hoped this hotel had improved on last year as is had potential and thought it may become a bit more upmarket and boutique, sadly it has gone downhill and now caters for the masses who want quantity not quality. The staff are lovely but are running around like headless chickens while management strut around not doing a great deal. George, Ana and Jocelyn were wonderful but too busy to talk to. 

Sheraton or Savoy for us next time.
data.title: Catering for the masses unfortunately.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
We would like to thank you for taking the time to share you note regarding your second stay in our property. We were really concerned to know that you did not enjoy your stay with us, please accept our sincere apologies. Your feedback is of great importance to us, only through your comments  and ratings can we aim to improve the service our guestsâ€™ receive, and in todayâ€™s world this is essential. At last, we do appreciate your point of view and you will be always welcomed whenever you decide to visit our hotel in any future occasion. 

 Best regards,
Hotel management
owner_response.author: KaiSol Romance Resort Adults Only

data.text:
Nice property, a little out of the way so no external nightlife but with everything you would expect from a upper mid range traditional all inclusive.
Rooms are good and clean if a little tired, pool strangely set behind the hotel but the beach is  just across the (pedestrianised) road and there are plenty of loungers and good beach services.
Food is essentially buffet and of good quality. 
The a la carte restaurants are small and only 4 were open when we were there. You need to pre book or visit the concierge on arrival for something a little different to the standard buffet.
Drinks plentiful but frankly to the European palette local alcohol is "not quite right!"
Ultra all inclusive Ikos it isn't, but it is a good safe 4 star option .
data.title: Nice, 4 Star, "traditional All-Inclusive", but wouldn't stay longer than a few days.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Paul W,

We would like to thank you for choosing our sunny hotel for your vacation in Hurghada. Sharing your vacation experience is very important for our management and other travelers. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay in our resort and some of our staff made your vacation special. We will put an eye on your recommendation. 

We hope that your positive experience with us will influence your next decision about vacation in Egypt and we will have an honor to welcome you back.

Best regards,
Hotel Management
owner_response.author: KaiSol Romance Resort Adults Only
